original_text: besides their 7,337 male and female slaves; and they also had 200 male and female singers.
korean_text: 그 외에 남종과 여종이 칠천삼백삼십칠 명이요 노래하는 남녀가 이백 명이요

sentences.original_text: besides their 7,337 male and female slaves
and they also had 200 male and female singers
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 또한 200명의 남녀 성가대를 두었더라
